1691980.name: Lawless Lands Smoking Sands DLC
1691980.description:
Lawless Lands

The alchemists of Guilanal have made a frightening new discovery that could change the battlefield as we know it.

Black Powder!

Smoking Sands DLC:
  • New Weapon Class - Firearms (Very powerful, but very expensive, have a high base chance to cause panicked and burning)
  • New Ammunition Class - Ball Ammo
  • 3 New Firearm Weapons (Boom Stick, Hand Cannon, Pole Cannon)
  • 1 New Dagger Weapon (Bayonet)
  • 3 New Attack Animations & Sounds
  • 5 New Firearm Ammunition Types (Ball Ammo, Flaring Ammo, Heavy Ammo, Impact Ammo, Rusted Ammo)
  • 3 New Firearm Attack Skills (Shoot, Hip Fire, Over Powder)
  • New Unique Title "Gunner"
  • New Special Item - Boombowl (Grenade-like throwable)
  • New Crafting Schematic - Boombowl
  • New Learnable Proficiency - Firearm Proficiency (Teaches a character how to use firearms)
  • 2 New Learnable Firearm Techniques (Gut Shot, Point Blank)
  • 1 Boom Stick and 1 set of Ball Ammo added to your Strongbox (You can buy more from Samadar at the Trade Caravan in the South)

*This DLC is intended for players who enjoy the game and want to continue to show their support for the developer and get some cool extras in the game.

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK, YOU MUST FIRST TALK TO HUSTAN IN THE PYRSHEN HOSPITAL TO ACTIVATE THE DLC! THEN, YOU CAN SPEAK TO SAMADAR AT THE TRADE CARAVAN IN THE DESERT TO THE FAR SOUTH. YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
